# API Reference

## Functional Helpers

::: gridio
    handler: python
    options:
      show_root_heading: true
      show_source: true
      members_order: alphabetical
      members:
        - textgrid_to_df
        - textgrid_to_data
        - df_to_textgrid
        - data_to_textgrid

## Object-Oriented API

::: gridio.textgrid
    handler: python
    options:
      show_root_heading: true
      show_source: true
      members_order: alphabetical
